name: 1 BIT ASTRONAUT-demo-beta
description:
1-bit Pixel Art Precision platforming game with physic based puzzles. Escape from an exploding space station and reach your space ship. Jump, run, use physics based items to solve the puzzles. Great game for casual gamers too. If you like Celeste, Geometry Dash and N++, this game is for you

Would be great if you give me feedback and wishlist on steam !
